content:
447 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    levelcredit passes in three (3) other relevant Arts or 
Social Sciences subjects at  not more than two (2) 
sittings. Candidates must earn an acceptable score in 
the  UTME  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) BENIN accepts one (1) Social Sciences subject and any 
other subject.  
(ii) OAU requires Government and any two (2) of 
Economics, Geography/Physics or Mathematics.  
(iii) IAUED requires Government and any other two (2) Arts 
or Social Sciences subjects.
